metadata.title: CVE-2018-7339 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The MP4Atom class in mp4atom.cpp in MP4v2 through 2.0.0 mishandles EntryNumber validation for the MP4 Table Property, which allows remote attackersto cause a denial of service (overflow, insufficient memory allocation, andsegmentation fault) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a craftedmp4 file.

criterions.comment: mp4v2 package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
